Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
08.10.2014 GB SCR19217 BSP213C/Test 4: Changed value of range in test if there is already an INVOICE

06.08.2014 SH SCR19055 BSP213 Added update SCHI_DISCOUNT1AMOUNT, SCHI_DISCOUNT2AMOUNT, SCHI_DISCOUNT3AMOUNT with related
new fields from NFIN
30.07.2014 SH SCR19028 BSP216 Removed test SCHT_WAITFORDOCUMENT = N, now it's only SCHT_NINVERR > 0 to set V.MQ99=True
20.06.2014 JH SCR18973 BSP216 Change MQ99 handling
23.04.2014 SH SCR18853 BSP213C Test 6: Changed source currency for recalc via GB902 from CLNT108_ACC_CURR to SCHI_INVCURRENCY
11.02.2014 SH SCR18677 BSP213A Step3/4a Added update SCHI_NEWDEBTOR = Y after call of BDH006; Added PIO.SCHI_NEWDEBTOR
for calling BSP213B/BSP213B1 (updated in these modules if a new debtor is added)
15.11.2013 SH SCR18504 BSP213C Test 11: Removed tests on CLNT203_OFFICE =/<> 'WAW'
30.08.2013 JH SCR18383 BSP211 Added test on SCHT_INVAMOUNTHASH <> 0 and SCHT_BOOKED=N
22.08.2013 JH SCR18359 BSP213C Step7: Added tests on DHRF119_DUPLICATEHANDLING
05.08.2013 SH SCR18325 Added BDH006.PI.MANUAL = 'N' (at 4 places)
27.06.2013 GB SCR18228 BSP213C: Extended Test 8/11
23.04.2013 GB SCR18114 BSP212: Set SCHT_SCHTNOCLI with NFIN_SCHTNOCLI + 1
20.02.2013 JH SCR17969 BSP212 Added test on ADMN_PLEDGEBYPROXY = Y for update of SCHT_WAITFORDOCUMENT
29.06.2012 JH SCR17128 BSP213C --> test 5. Added test on SCHI_INVDELETED = N
01.06.2012 JH SCR17128 BSP213C --> test 4. Undo of the change of 17.02.2012.
26.02.2012 GB SCR17153 Changed condition for allow start BSP001 in the BSP210/Reverse factoring
17.02.2012 SH SCR17128 BSP213C --> Test 4: Changed test from SCHT_SCHEDULETYPE = 1 to <> 2
16.01.2012 JH SCR17050 BSP212 Changed condition for update SCHT_CHECKINVOICES
21.09.2011 GB SCR16767 Changed value of update the SCHT_USRIDTOENTER (BSP212)
20.09.2011 SH SCR16756 BSP213A Added task "Step5. AddDebtorDetails(10/20)"
27.06.2011 GB SCR16561 Relplaced the GSET_YESNO(244) by the GSBU_YESNO(1244)
25.06.2011 GB SCR16556 Replaced the GSET(291) by the GSBU(1291)
03.06.2011 SH SCR16501 BSP213 Changed updates on SCHI_INVDELETED for reverse
factoring (due days out of range>
27.05.2011 SH SCR16471 BSP213C Test 11: Changed test SCHI_NETPAYMENTDAYS >
DHRF107_DUEDATESMAXNUMBER in SCHI_DUEDATE - GNRL_DAYPROGRAMSDATE
> DHRF107_DUEDATESMAXNUMBER
23.05.2011 SH SCR16471 BSP213C Test 6: Changed calc of sum (SCHI_INVAMOUNTC)
13.05.2011 SH SCR16459 BSP213C Test 6: Fixed bug with division by 0
05.05.2011 SH SCR16446 Replaced table CURR by CURA
17.04.2011 GB SCR16390 Removed update V.INFS_CODE if V.INFS_CODE = blank
14.04.2011 JOH SCR16366 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
and GB002 by GB902
05.04.2011 SH SCR16347 BSP212 Added update SCHT_STARTEDFROMBSP150
16.03.2011 GB SCR16291 Extended condition for update the SCHI_INVDELETED,
added the test11 in the BSP213C, changed condition for call the BMQ005(190)
11.03.2011 GB SCR16290 Extend the call of BDH006 with PI.LEGALOWNER
19.01.2011 SH SCR16159 BSP213RF Added AVOI_DUEDATE
17.01.2011 SH SCR16146 BSP213C Test 10: Dummy debtor added: Added test
SCHI_DEBH_NO = GSET_DEBH_NO(292)
05.10.2010 GB SCR15848 Changed condition for call the BMQ005 in the BSP216
added Test 10: Dummy debtor added in the BSP213C
23.07.2010 SH SCR16542 BSP213D Test7: Removed test CLNT212_CONFIDENTIAL = N
and CLNT212_INTERCREDIT = N (Dummy debtor added)
09.07.2010 SH SCR15601 BSP213C Added new test 9 WKA amount > invoice amount
08.06.2010 GB SCR15539 Replacement calls the BMQ001 by the BMQ005
18.03.2010 GB SCR15346 Changed condition for call the Test 5 in BSP213C
18.01.2010 SH SCR15255 BSP212 Changed update SCHT_DEBTORNUMBERTYPE
09.11.2009 SH SCR15029 BSP212 Removed most of the test to store the 2 SCHT rows;
Extended BSP216 to delete empty schedules
18.09.2009 SH SCR14915 Removed update SCHI_INVDELETED =Y if
in case of no debtor and country
11.09.2009 SH SCR14882 BSP212 Set SCHT_WAITFORDOCUMENT = 'Y' if
CLNT101_ADMNO<>3 and CLNT212_INTERCREDIT = Y and CLNT304_PLEDGEBYPROXY = N
04.08.2009 SH SCR14775 BSP213 Extended updates on SCHI_INVDELETED and
added updates on SCHI_REASONWHYDELETED (f.i. UHRC checks); BSP213A Removed
test on DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY = blank
29.07.2009 SH SCR14763 BSP212/213 Added tests on MARK_COMMVIAICFILE
to store schedules with markcodes
21.07.2009 SH SCR14755 BSP216 Extended test "SCHT_CHECKINVOICES=Y" to store
MQ99 with " and CLNT212_INTERCREDIT = N and CLNT212_CONFIDENTIAL = N"
03.06.2009 SH SCR14663 BSP213 Added storing SCHI_HADR_NAME1 =
25.05.2009 SH SCR14640 BSP216 Disabled start of BSP001 if SCHT_POSTPONEDTODATE
is updated
19.05.2009 SH SCR14650 BSP216 Changed test to call BMQ001 (MQ99)
08.05.2009 SH SCR14629 BSP216 Changed test to set SCHT_CHECKLINVOICES
part "GSET_AMOUNT > 0"
04.05.2009 SH SCR14605 BSP213A Step4 Added update DEBC_LANGUAGE
31.03.2009 SH SCR14267 BSP213A Step4 Added special handling GSET_ID=292 to
handle new debtors (DCDD) with complete/incomplete debtor details
31.03.2009 SH SCR14394 BSP213 Added RF-MF handling
30.09.2008 SH SCR14011 Added UFB544.PI.RemoveLeadingZeros=TRUE
29.09.2008 SH SCR13938 BSP213D Added test on ADMN_CHECKINVOICES;
BSP216 Added updates on SCHT_CHECKINVOICES (GSET_ID = 291)
26.09.2008 GB SCR13996 Changed condition for SCHT_CALCCOMMISSION (BSP212)
18.08.2008 SH SCR13881 BSP210 Replaced test CLNT601_NOCOMOVERICFILEALLINV
= Y by CLNT212_CONFIDENTIAL = Y
29.07.2008 SH SCR13827 BSP213A Added test on V.DUPLICATEDEBTOR = N
to perform step 5
04.07.2008 SH SCR13747 Extended update of SCHT_CHECKINVOICES for intercredit
and confidential clients
20.05.2008 GB SCR13642 Added update SCHT_AUTOMATIC = Y in BSP216
28.04.2008 SH SCR13568 BSP213C Extended test 4 (duplicate invoice) with test on
SCHT_STORNO_BY_SCHT_NO = 0
05.02.2008 SH SCR13332 BSP212 Extended update of SCHT_APPROVALREQUIRED and
fixed problem with test on STIC_ARCH_HYPA_ID > 0
04.02.2008 SH SCR13349 BSP212/213 Extended storing of SCHT/SCHI acc.to
CLNT212_INTERCREDIT / CONFIDENTIAL
04.02.2008 SH SCR13332 BSP216 Extended test to call BMQ001 (MQ99) with test on
'or SCHT_NINVERR > 0'
30.01.2008 SH SCR13340 Removed function to delete leading zeros from invoice
29.01.2008 SH SCR13332 BSP216 Added test on SCHT_APPROVALREQUIRED = N or space
11.01.2008 SH SCR13273 BSP212 Changed update of SCHT_APPROVALREQUIRED to
be updated with CLNT304_NEWSCHEDULESVIAACCMAN
BSP213 changed sort on NFIN (NFIN_NFIR_NO, NFIN_INVNO)
10.01.2008 SH SCR13265 BSP213C --> Test 7: Removed NFIN duplicate check
09.01.2008 SH SCR13267 BSP213 Extended update of SCHI_NETPAYMENTDAYS and
changed sort on NFIN (NFIN_NFIR_NO, NFIN_LINENO)
BSP214 Added test on CLNT212_SAF = N to store dummy invoices
18.12.2007 SH SCR13201 BSP212 Extended update of SCHT_SCHEDULETYPE (for invoices
and added test on NFIN_MARKCODETEXT = 0 to store SCHT/SCHI rows
20.11.2007 SH SCR13128 BSP212 Extended update of SCHT_WAITFORDOCUMENT
if CLNT304_PLEDGEBYPROXY = 'Y'; BSP216: Added call of BSP012
14.11.2007 SH SCR13092 BSP212 Extended update SCHT_WAITFORDOCUMENT with
test on CLNT304_PLEDGEBYPROXY = 'Y'
24.10.2007 SH SCR13030 BSP213D Added update of SCHT_CHECKINVOICES
02.10.2007 SH SCR12947 BSP213A Step3 If NFIN_DEBC_DEBC = blank then '0' is used
to store new detor via BDH006
30.08.2007 SH SCR12869 Added GB055.PI.INFS_CODE
20.08.2007 SH SCR12679 BSP213A Changed GB055 argument list
07.08.2007 SH SCR12580 BSP213 Extended update of SCHI_DUPLICATEINVOICEISOK
25.04.2007 SH SCR12330 BSP213A Part 3 Changed selection of DHIC (DHIC_INFS_CODE)
25.04.2007 SH SCR12330 BSP216 Changed update of SCHT_INVAMOUNTBOOKED
16.04.2007 SH SCR12330 BSP215 Changed store of STCY_TOTACREDNOTESBOOKED
to use new ABS() for update
12.04.2007 SH SCH12330 BSP213A Step3 Removed test on DEBC_DEBC
11.04.2007 SH SCR12330 BSP216 Added storing of SCHT_TOTNDEBTNOTES and
SCHT_TOTNCREDNOTES and SCHT_USRIDENTERED
11.04.2007 SH SCR12330 BSP213 Added mising update of SCHI_INFS_CODE;
BSP213A Fixed problems with start of step 3
-- Check / store schedule total if it's not a restart of BSP210
-- BSP213 is performed with transaction handling on invoice row level
-- Final updates (BSP214, BSP215 and BSP216 are performed in one transaction)
-- Check if it's a restart of BSP210, then modules BSP211 - 213 have to be
skipped
-- Table NFIR is opened for write access
-- Obtain first NFIN row to fetch some variables which are the same for all NFIN
rows (opened for read only)
-- NFIN totals uses for Range on SCHT (see BSP211)
(has to be calc before BSP211 because amounts are used for
-- BSP211 - Select schedule
-- BSP212 - Store SCHEDULE_TOTAL row(s)
(NFIR_SCHT_NO_INVOICES could be already > 0, see BSP211)
-- Update variables uses for further handling --> BSP213, ...

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(NFIN_INVAMOUNTI) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(abs(NFIN_INVAMOUNTI)) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/NFIN where NFIN_NFIR_NO = :2 for fetch only

Text.val: -- Check for existing SCHI row
-- If there are no SCHEDULE_INVOICE rows then this SCHEDULE_TOTAL row
can be used to store the invoices
-- First SCHT row for invoices without markcode
... prepare variables to store SCHT
-- Second SCHT row for invoices with markcode
... prepare variables to store SCHT
-- In case of invoice files are uploaded via website there is no need to wait
for a document, already created before via BXA408
-- Set SCHT_DEBTORNUMBERTYPE
... 1 = Client
... 2 = Heller
@ NFIN rows are directly deleted if the schedule invoice is stored, see task
properties --> TransactionLevel = NFIN row
-- Check if invoice currency = euro currency
-- Get national registration number, uses to update SCHI_INFS_CODE
... only if a debtor ID (national debtor ID) exist
-- In case of a restart get the highest SCHI_LINENO
-- Prepare variables to store SCHI row
-- Update SCHI debtor fields
-- Recalculate invoice amounts
... recalculate euro currencies (e.g. 'PLN' to 'EUR')
... recalculate to administration / client currency
-- Update SCHI_DUEDATE
-- Credit note is always immediately overdue
-- BSP213C Test for erros
-- BSP213D - Invoice checks
-- BSP213RF - Handle reverse factoring Aviso's
-- BSP213E - Invoice checks RF-MF
-- Further updates on SCHI_INVDELETED = 'Y' (default with 'N')
... due days reverse factoring out of range
... debtor not allowed
... UHRC country
... set reason code why invoice is deleted
-- 1.Client debtor numbers
-- Format debtor number
... always if GSET_QUANTITY(38) >1 and <9,
else leading zeros have to be removed if GSET_QUANTITY = 0 and
CLNT306_CLNTDEBTNO_NUMERIC =Y
-- If one debtor client was selected we are finished
... go to step 9. End of debtor number tests
-- 2. Heller debtor numbers
-- If one debtor client was selected we are finished
... go to step 9. End of debtor number tests
... If no debtor was detected in step 1 or 2 continue with further steps
... go to step 4. Check if "new" debtor is already in the database
... go to step 3. ID numbers used as debtor number
... go to step 9. End of debtor number tests
-- 3. ID numbers used as debtor number
... if NFIN_DEBTOR_ID <> blank the client mentioned the national registration
number
-- 4. Check if "new" debtor is already in the database
... at this point in the program the client mentioned a debtornumber but this
debtor does not exist yet.
-- 5. Add debtor with details from new recordlayout (type 10/20)
-- 6. Add dummy debtor
-- 9. End of debtor number tests
.. DEBC row was selected or added
... DEBC row was not selected or added
-- In case of multiple DEBC rows are selected we can't use one of the debtors
... in case of multiple DEBC rows are selected
-- National registration number is not valid, go to step 9
-- National registration number is valid, perform further steps
... try to fetch DHIC_DEBH from DHIC
-- If no DHIC row is selected (v.DHIC_DEBH_NO = 0)
... go to step 4. Check if "new" debtor is already in the database
... go to step 9. End of debtor number tests
-- If a DHIC row is selected (v.DHIC_DEBH_NO > 0) check if a row exists in DEBC
-- If one debtor client was selected we are finished
... go to step 9. End of debtor number tests
-- If there are multiple matches go to 9. End of debtor number tests
-- If there is no match the debtor can be added as DEBTOR_CLIENT.
-- In case of multiple DEBC rows are selected we can't use one of the debtors
... in case of multiple DEBC rows are selected
-- "New" debtor (Exists in DCDD) is already in the database
... if not exists goto step 5
-- New debtor client is added, could be used to store the invoice now
-- New debtor client is added, could be used to store the invoice now
-- Info: DEBC_COUNTRY = DCDD_HADR_COUNTRY
-- Set langauge (Info: DEBC_COUNTRY = DCDD_HADR_COUNTRY)
-- New debtor client is added, could be used to store values from invoice now
-- New debtor client is added
-- Fetch SCHT again, to complicated to work with virtuals, because
2 different SCHT rows are possible (invoices with / without markcodes)
-- Test 1: Duplicate debtor
-- Test 2: New debtor
-- Test 3: Invalid debtor ID
-- Test 4: Duplicate invoice number (2 = storno schedule) --> table INVO
-- Test 5: Duplicate invoice number (2 = storno schedule) --> table SCHI
-- Test 6: Investment limit reverse factoring
-- Test 7: Duplicate invoice number reverse factoring
-- Test 8: Minimum due days reverse factoring
-- Test 9: WKA amount > invoice amount
-- Test 10: Dummy debtor added
-- Test 11: maximum due days reverse factoring
-- All tests performed --> Update SCHI_INVERROR = 'Y' in case of any errors

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(SCHI_INVAMOUNTC) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/SCHI, :1/SCHT where SCHI_SCHT_NO = SCHT_NO and SCHI_INVBOOKED = 'N' and SCHI_ERRCODE1 = 0 and SCHI_DEBH_NO = :2 and SCHT_BOOKED = 'N' for fetch only

Text.val: ... add also SCHI_INVAMOUNTC of current SCHI row which is not yet stored finally
-- Fetch SCHT again, to complicated to work with virtuals, because
2 different SCHT rows are possible (invoices with / without markcodes)
... have to be update in case of invoices have to be checked
-- Test 1: Invoice date in the past
-- Test 2: Invoice date in the future
-- Test 3: Net days = 0 for debit notes
-- Test 4: Maximum allowed payment term exceeded
-- Test 5: Markcode entered
-- Test 6: WKA amount > 50 % invoice
-- Test 7: Dummy debtor added
-- Update schedule
... store one AVISO detail row
... store multiple AVISO original invoice rows
-- Fetch SCHT again, to complicated to work with virtuals, because
2 different SCHT rows are possible (invoices with / without markcodes)
... have to be update in case of invoices have to be checked
... store current value of variable, only if <> 'Y' and set to 'Y' in the next
tests, then the SCHT variables have to be updated
-- Test 1: Addition tests correction invoices
-- Update schedule
@ BSP214, 215, 216 could be performed in one module to prevent too many
database selections but then the modules becomes very complex
Only in case of performance problems this has to be done in the future
-- BSP214 - Add dummy invoice confidential clients
... for invoices without markcode
... for invoices with markcode
-- BSP215 - Store SCHEDULE_TOTAL_CURRENCY
... for invoices without markcode
... for invoices with markcode
-- BSP216 - Close Schedules
... for invoices without markcode
... for invoices with markcode
-- Reset variables
-- Set variables
... build totals per currency
-- Get highest SCHI_LINENO
-- Update SCHI debtor fields
-- Reset variables
-- Set variables
... build totals per currency
-- Totals per schedule currency
-- Totals per schedule total
-- Start BSP001 to book the invoices
-- Start BSP012 to try booking the invoices
-- Reset variables
-- Set variables
-- Recalculate totals
... general currency
... client currency
-- Build totals
... build totals per currency
... build totals

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*) from :1/SCHI where SCHI_SCHT_NO = :2 and SCHI_INVDELETED = 'N' and SCHI_INVERROR = 'Y' for fetch only

Text.val: -- Store MQ99/190 to inform the users that invoices have to be checked
-- Start BSP012 (see T.S. of parent task)
-- Reverse factoring
-- If all invoices are above f.i. 1.000.000 then the schedule must be checked
-- If the sum of all credit notes is f.i. > 500.000 then the schedule must be
checked

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(SCHI_INVAMOUNTH) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/SCHI where SCHI_SCHT_NO = :2 and SCHI_INVAMOUNTH > 0 for fetch only
select cast(sum(abs(SCHI_INVAMOUNTH)) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/SCHI where SCHI_SCHT_NO = :2 and SCHI_INVAMOUNTH < 0 for fetch only

Text.val: -- In case of reverse factoring SCHI_DEBH_NO is always the same for one schedule
total
-- Check if it's allowed to book the file immediately
--- extract date and time stamp from original file name
... it's not allowed to start BSP001 now

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*) from :1/SCHI where SCHI_SCHT_NO = :2 and SCHI_INVAMOUNTH > :3 for fetch only
